_Note from Nethys: This item is a constituent part of the [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200) archetype using the [archetype artifact](/Rules.aspx?ID=1961) rules._

A gift passed from warrior to warrior, this cowl is made from a [cave bear's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=48) skull and fur. Once invested, the wearer gains a +1 item bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks to [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58), which increases to +2 if the animal is a [bear](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=13). The wearer of the hood feels a constant longing for the wilderness and wild places and takes a –1 item penalty to all [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) or [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) if they go more than 5 days inside a large town or city without spending at least 4 hours in the wilderness.

**Destruction** Soak the _Ursine Avenger Hood_ in the blood of a [linnorm](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=69) that is at least 16th level and then burn it in a fire that uses only oak and chrysanthemum as fuel.
